title: Cancel an Auto Policy
description: A customer sold their car and wants to cancel their auto insurance policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their request to cancel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and confirms their intent.

tasks.description: Calculate and explain any prorated refund the customer will receive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the refund amount and clearly explains when and how the customer will receive it.
